404_page_content: Sorry but we couldn't find the page you are looking for. Please check to make sure you've typed the URL correctly. You may also want to search for what you are looking for.
footer_copyright_text: ©[the-year] Atelier · Made with  <i class="fa fa-heart"></i>   by Swift Ideas using [wp-link]. Power Elite since '14.
footer_copyright_text_right: ©[the-year] Joyn · Built with love by Swift Ideas using [wp-link].
footer_promo_bar_text: Enter your promo bar text here.
checkout_new_account_text: Creating an account with Joyn is quick and easy, and will allow you to move through our checkout quicker. You can also store multiple shipping addresses, gain access to your order history, and much more.
help_bar_text: Need help? Call customer services on 0800 123 4567.
